resources.string:
Hello, my name is Raphael Abreu. 

I love to code, play guitar, stay with my fiance, play with my neighbors' cats and read some intresting books. 

As a Computer Engineering student, I build some devices that involve both hardware and software to do something interesting, like once I made an app to remotely monitor and water your plants. 

Being in nature is my passion and I really appreciate good times barefoot in the woods or even on the grass. 

Fortunately, I like cooking and best of all, I love my food, so I have no problem spending hours preparing everything I like.
